name: Matchsticks (widearchshark)
description:
Game objective: Don't be left with the last match!

A random number of matches will drop on to the table. You will be able to pick up a maximum of 3 matches (you must take at least 1), and then it will be the computers turn. They can also take a maximum of 3 matches.

Play continues until only one match remains. Whoever is left with one match is the loser!

You always go first, so you should always win, right?

Let me know how you get on... GOOD LUCK!
